description: This file contains a React component implementing a Tic Tac Toe game with styling, state management, and game logic, including functions to determine the winner and handle user interactions.

methods.name: TicTacToe
methods.description: React functional component rendering the Tic Tac Toe game interface with state management and user interaction handling.

methods.name: calculateWinner
methods.description: Pure function to determine the winner of the current Tic Tac Toe board, returning the winner and the winning line indices if any.
